name: Amazon Fire TV 55" 4-Series 4K UHD smart TV (2024 Release)
pros: Deep integration with Alexa and the Amazon ecosystem
Clean, modern design with very slim bezels
Guaranteed software security updates for at least 4 years
Includes a versatile Alexa Voice Remote Enhanced
Good selection of ports including HDMI eARC
cons: Mixed user reports on reliability and device stopping working
Sound quality receives mixed reviews; external speakers may be needed
Some users report slow startup and menu response times
Limited to HDR10 and HLG (no Dolby Vision support)
No advanced gaming features like VRR or ALLM
